titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on paraquat technical.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on paraquat technical.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) revise the article description for paraquat technical; and (2) suspend temporarily the duty on such article.
